channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Three potholes close together on Norwood Road, just south of its junction with Grafton Road, 25th March
item.description:
There are three potholes close together on Norwood Road, just south of its junction with Grafton Road. They are steadily deteriorating.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Norwood Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Biggest driveways in the street lol, 25th March

item.title: The whole road is a mess!, 24th March
item.description:
This road has been in an absolute state of disrepair for years now and yet STILL you continue to "patch" it up. The speed humps are causing premature wear to my car as they're like driving into a curb. I feel better traffic calming measures could be put in place ie. chicanes or speed cushions which would lessen the impact on vehicles. Its got to the point where I'm actively looking to move house because of this poxy road!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 111 Caernarvon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
